tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive details for specific accommodation properties including descriptions, photos, policies, and contact information.

property_ids.description: List of property IDs to fetch details for

include_photos.description: Whether to include photo URLs in results

include_policies.description: Whether to include cancellation and booking policies

include_contact_info.description: Whether to include property contact information

error_messages: Invalid property IDs: Provide 1-20 valid property identifier strings.
Properties not found: One or more property IDs could not be located.
Data retrieval error: Unable to fetch complete property details. Some properties may have limited information available.
Access denied: Some property details require authentication or special permissions.
usage: Provide property_ids array and set boolean flags for including photos, policies, and contact information. Returns detailed information for each requested property.

star_ratings.description: Official star ratings (1-5) for each property

amenity_lists.description: Comma-separated lists of amenities for each property

photo_urls.description: Primary photo URLs for each property (if include_photos=true)
